content: What an inspiring article for a Monday morning Shaunta. Thanks for sharing it. My philosophy is exactly like yours. In fact, I’ve just published the first in a series of 10 “50 simple hacks & habits to help hardwire you/your startup/small business for success” and it’s exactly the sort of stuff you describe.
